Description:
General
Brand: Deepcool
Model: PX1200G


Details
Type: ATX 3.0 Compatible
Maximum Power: 1200 W
Fans: 1 x 135 mm FDB Fan
PFC: Active
Max PSU Length: 160 mm
Modular: Full Modular
Power Good Signal: 100-150ms
Hold-up Time: >=16ms
Efficiency: >=90% Under Typical Load(50%  Loading)
Energy-Efficient: 80 PLUS GOLD Certified
Protection: OPP/OVP/SCP/OTP/OCP/UVP
MTBF: >100,000 Hours
Approvals: CE/FCC/CCC/TUV-RH/RCM/EAC/CAN ICES-003(B)/NMB-003(B)/UKCA/BIS;


Features
Features: The DeepCool PX1200G is a newly designed power supply that meets the latest ATX 3.0 standard. With a dedicated 12VHPWR, 2 EPS, and 3 PCI-e ports, the PX1200G provides stable power for a wide range of components. Through the use of all Japanese and a dual main capacitor topology, the PX1200G can keep the hold-up time to >=16ms under full load. Equipped with the new PCI-e Gen 5.0 12VHPWR cable, the PX1200G provides up to 600W for power-hungry GPUS. 80 Plus Gold certified for higher efficiency.


Dimension & Weight
Dimensions: 6.3 *5.91*3.39 (in)
Weight: 6.39lbs
Label: Fuente DeepCool PX1200G 1200W
